headline: Lordstown Motors stock up 75% in last month
author: Dave Sess
sentences: (WKBN) — Goldman Sachs revealed its opinion Monday that almost half of all cars on the road by 2040 will be electric.
The $3.69 closing price was the company’s highest since three days after Christmas.
Lordstown Motors stock got a 48-cent charge or 14% from the info release.
It’s up 75% in the last month, but still down 68% over the past year.
